description: Try our easy to follow Banana Bread And Butter Puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Banana Bread And Butter Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 20 minutes or until edges of puddings are just browned and custard has only a slight wobble. Rest for 5 minutes in tray, then carefully remove. Serve with cream or ice-cream.
